description: Includes the provision of temporary personnel to support computer applications.
full_summary:
======================
### Tender Announcement: NPP – S4381443 - Temporary Help Services for the Department of National Defense

**Title:** Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)

**Reference Number:** cb-4833-86480787

**Contracting Authority:** Department of National Defense

**Contact Information:**

* Email: CFSGO.GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO.Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (613) 971-7955

### Tender Information:

* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-04-24T11:30:00
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements:**
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)

### Requirement Description:

The Department of National Defense (DND) requires Temporary Help Services to support the execution of specific tasks and projects. This requirement is open to certified supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870, qualified in the stream 5.1 Computer, Application Support.

The following select suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc.
* Calian Ltd.
* Coradix technology Consulting Ltd.
* CSI Consulting Inc.
* DLS Technology Corporation
* IBISKA Telecom Inc.
* IPSS INC.
* MGIS Inc. & iGeoSpy Inc. in JV
* Michael Wager Consulting Inc.
* Modis Canada Inc
* Promaxis Systems Inc
* Spirit Personnel Inc.
* The AIM Group Inc.
* The Halifax Computer Consulting Group Inc.
* TRM Technologies Inc.

### Security Requirement:

A minimum security level of Secret is required for all resources engaged under this requirement.

### Tender Documents:

Available for download at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4833/s4381443-rfp-competitive-method-1-right-fit.pdf (English) and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4833/s4381443-dp-methode-concurrentielle-1%2C-ressource-appropriee.pdf (French). 
####################################################################################

Profit! Please let me know if you
